# GET /v1/subscriptionAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/availableTerritories | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptionAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/availableTerritories ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-availableTerritories)

-  GET /v1/subscriptionAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/availableTerritories 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptionAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/availableTerritories

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-availableTerritories#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptionAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/availableTerritories
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-availableTerritories#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-availableTerritories#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-availableTerritories#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionAvailabilityAvailableTerritoriesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionavailabilityavailableterritorieslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-availableTerritories#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-availableTerritories#Endpoints)

[`Read the availability of a subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionavailabilities-_id_)Get information about the territory availability for a subscription.[`List the territory availability of a subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionavailabilities-_id_-availableterritories)List the territory availability and currency of a specific subscription.[`Modify the territory availability of a subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptionavailabilities)Update the territory availability of a specific subscription.
